alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 8:56AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Phillips and west central Valley Counties through 1000 AM MDT... At 855 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles north of Fourchette, or 23 miles east of Zortman, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malta, Saco, Phillips, The Bentonite Plant, Bowdoin and Content. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
